title: 这mod不兼容如何破
txt_content: 1.8版本的，砍树mod不兼容怎么破在线等

replies.author: Todd-mine
replies.txt_content:
http://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/bspkrscore/files
这个网站，下7.01的，替换掉原来的

Forge Mod Loader has found a problem with your minecraft installation 
The mods and versions listed below could not be found 
bspkrsCore:minimum version required is 7.01 
The file "ForgeModLoader-client-0.log" contains more information         
出现了这个怎么破

replies.author: wahaha216
replies.txt_content: bspkrsCore：最小版本要求 7.01，看看你是否有安装以及版本是否大于等于7.01
